title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 400.9 - Service of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 400.9 - Service of rules

State Regulations

Every notice of hearing served shall be served with a copy of
these rules, a copy of articles 3, 4 and 5 of the State Administrative

Procedure Act and relevant definitions under section 102 of the State

Administrative Procedure Act. A summary of these rules will be prepared and
made available to the public on request and served with a notice of hearing on
any respondent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
400.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
